attributes.action: Abolish the 10 day quarantine period for arrivals from amber list countries
attributes.additional_details: We were told by Matt Hancock we were going to have Great British Summer this year and we’re now in June and unlikely to be able to have a holiday abroad. I want the government to consider the removal of the 10 quarantine for the double vaccinated visiting an amber list country. This will give us back “some” freedom and furthermore give us the choice to holiday in an amber list country.
attributes.background: If the UK government will allow 60,000 spectators at Wembley for Euro 2020 along with certain other sporting events, under its Events Research Programme. The government can also consider removing the 10 quarantine for all the double vaccinated under its Double Vaccination Research Programme

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588597
